com.github.cwilper.ttff
Class Sources

java.lang.Object
  com.github.cwilper.ttff.Sources

public final class Sources
extends Object

Static utility methods for creating, filtering, and draining Sources.

empty

public static <T> Source<T> empty()
Gets an empty source.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Returns:
the source.

filter

public static <T> Source<T> filter(Source<T> source,
                                   Filter<T> filter)
Gets a version of the given source whose items are subject to the given filter. Items may be omitted or transformed by the filter.

When the returned source is closed, the wrapped source will also be closed, but the filter will not be.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Parameters:
source - the source to filter.
filter - the filter to use.
Returns:
the filtering source.

items - the items.
Returns:
the source.

iterator

public static <T> Iterator<T> iterator(Source<T> source)
Gets an iterator that wraps the given source.

Callers must ensure that the wrapped source is closed when no longer needed; the returned iterator provides no close() method.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Parameters:
source - the source.
Returns:
the iterator.

join

public static <T> Source<T> join(Source<T>... sources)
Gets a source that joins the given sources end to end.

When closed, the returned source will ensure the wrapped sources are all closed.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Parameters:
sources - the iterator of sources to join.
Returns:
the joined source.

join

public static <T> Source<T> join(Collection<Source<T>> collection)
Gets a source that joins the given collection of sources end to end.

When closed, the returned source will ensure the wrapped sources are all closed.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Parameters:
collection - the collection of sources to join.
Returns:
the joined source.

join

public static <T> Source<T> join(Iterator<Source<T>> iterator)
Gets a source that joins the given iterator of sources end to end.

When closed, the returned source will ensure the wrapped sources are all closed.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Parameters:
iterator - the sources to join.
Returns:
the joined source.

drain

public static <T> long drain(Source<T> source)
                  throws IOException
Exhausts the given source.

The source will be automatically closed regardless of success.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Parameters:
source - the source to exhaust.
Returns:
the number of items encountered.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O problem occurs.

drain

public static <T> long drain(Source<T> source,
                             Collection<T> collection)
                  throws IOException
Exhausts the given source, adding each item to the given collection.

The source will be automatically closed regardless of success.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Parameters:
source - the source to exhaust.
collection - the collection add each item to.
Returns:
the number of items encountered.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O problem occurs.

drain

public static <T> long drain(Source<T> source,
                             Sink<T> sink)
                  throws IOException
Exhausts the given source, sending each item to the given sink.

The source will be automatically closed regardless of success.

Type Parameters:
T - the type.
Parameters:
source - the source to exhaust.
sink - the sink to send each item to.
Returns:
the number of items encountered.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O problem occurs.
